input.command:
git add PLAN_TO_MAKE_JEFFREYSPROMPTS_WEBAPP_AND_CLI_TOOL.md && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
Major plan overhaul: monorepo, BM25 search, templating, enhanced CLI

This commit represents a comprehensive architectural evolution of the
JeffreysPrompts.com plan, introducing significant improvements across
all major subsystems.

## 1. CORE PACKAGE ARCHITECTURE

Restructure from apps/web/src/lib/... to packages/core/ as @jfp/core:
- Create packages/core/src/ with prompts/, search/, export/, template/
- Add workspace wiring in root package.json (packages/* + apps/*)
- Update all imports to use @jfp/core/prompts, @jfp/core/search, etc.
- Both CLI and web app now import from the shared core package
- Eliminates code duplication and ensures single source of truth

Benefits:
- Type-safe sharing between CLI and web
- Independent versioning of core logic
- Cleaner dependency boundaries

## 2. SEARCH SYSTEM OVERHAUL

Replace MiniSearch/Fuse.js with BM25-based search:
- Remove minisearch and fuse.js dependencies
- Add custom BM25 implementation in packages/core/src/search/bm25.ts
- Add synonyms map (fix/repair, docs/readme, perf/speed) for better recall
- Remove Rust-WASM semantic search complexity (Part 14 simplified)
- Optional semantic rerank deferred to later phase (lazy-loaded)

Rationale:
- BM25 is tiny, fast, and deterministic
- No external model downloads required
- Semantic rerank can be added as progressive enhancement

## 3. PROMPT SYSTEM ENHANCEMENTS

New types and features for richer prompt definitions:
- Add PromptVariable type for templated prompts ({{PROJECT_NAME}})
- Add PromptChange type for changelog tracking
- Add variables?: PromptVariable[] to Prompt interface
- Add changelog?: PromptChange[] for version history
- Add schema validation with zod/valibot
- Enforce Prompt ID rules: lowercase kebab-case, stable, validated

New template system:
- packages/core/src/template/render.ts for safe {{VAR}} substitution
- No logic, no eval - pure string replacement
- Used by both web UI and CLI

## 4. CLI MAJOR REFACTOR

Switch from manual parseFlags to `cac` library:
- Cleaner command registration with cli.command()
- Better option parsing and validation
- Automatic --help generation

New commands added:
- jfp render <id> ‚Äî render prompt with variables
- jfp open <id> ‚Äî open prompt permalink in browser
- jfp registry status/refresh ‚Äî cache management
- jfp serve ‚Äî MCP server mode over stdio
- jfp completion --shell ‚Äî shell completions

New flags:
- --pretty for human-readable JSON (compact by default for agents)
- --dry-run for update command (show changes without writing)
- --fill for copy command (prompt for missing variables)
- --context <path> for render (append file contents)
- --stdin for render (read context from stdin)
- --semantic for suggest (optional rerank toggle)

Improvements:
- Clipboard: try wl-copy before xclip on Linux (Wayland support)
- Atomic file writes using renameSync for safer updates
- Check x_jfp_generated before overwriting modified skills
- Registry SWR caching for live prompt updates

## 5. SKILLS SYSTEM IMPROVEMENTS

Enhanced SKILL.md metadata:
- Add version, author, category, tags to YAML frontmatter
- Add source URL for attribution
- Add x_jfp_generated: true marker for safe updates
- Use JSON.stringify for YAML values (proper escaping)

Skills manifest system:
- Track {promptId, version, updatedAt, hash} in manifest.json
- Enable deterministic jfp update behavior
- Only overwrite x_jfp_generated skills unless --force

## 6. INSTALL SCRIPT SECURITY

Safer shell scripting practices:
- Change set -e to set -euo pipefail
- Add IFS=$'\n\t' for safer word splitting
- Add JFP_TARGET_DIR environment variable override
- Add SHA256 checksum verification for binaries
- Refuse to overwrite existing installation
- Use temp directory for downloads before moving

## 7. WEB APP ENHANCEMENTS

New pages:
- /prompts/[id] ‚Äî prompt permalink pages (SEO, shareable)
- /bundles/[id] ‚Äî bundle permalink pages
- /workflows ‚Äî workflow builder UI
- /contribute ‚Äî contribution helper (generates TypeScript entry)

API improvements:
- Add ETag + conditional GET for /api/prompts
- Add stale-while-revalidate caching headers
- Add bundles and workflows to /api/prompts response
- Add /api/health endpoint for uptime checks
- Prefer static /embeddings.json over /api/embeddings route

PWA + offline:
- Add manifest.json and icons
- Service worker for caching
- Offline banner when using cached data

Other:
- Error boundaries with fallback UI
- Privacy-respecting analytics (Plausible-style)
- Lazy-load search engine in SpotlightSearch

## 8. CI/CD SIMPLIFICATION

Simplified workflows:
- Remove WASM build jobs (no longer needed)
- Remove cargo Dependabot entry
- Streamline release workflow
- Add scripts/build-data.ts instead of validate-prompts.ts

## 9. QUALITY & DOCUMENTATION

New accessibility section:
- Full keyboard navigation for SpotlightSearch
- ARIA labels for buttons, tags, filters, dialogs
- Basic contrast checks in CI

New quality metrics:
- JS bundle size budget (warn > 200KB gz)
- CLS < 0.1, INP < 200ms (lab)
- Prompt permalink pages indexable

Transcript safety:
- Add scripts/redact-transcript.ts
- Add scripts/validate-publication.ts
- CI guard against secrets in transcripts

JSON output contract:
- --json is compact by default (agent-optimized)
- --pretty enables indented JSON (human-friendly)
- Golden tests for stable JSON schema

## 10. PROJECT STRUCTURE UPDATES

packages/core/ additions:
- src/prompts/{types,registry,bundles,workflows,schema}.ts
- src/export/{skills,markdown}.ts
- src/search/{bm25,tokenize,semantic}.ts
- src/template/{render,variables}.ts

apps/web/ additions:
- app/prompts/[id]/page.tsx
- app/bundles/[id]/page.tsx
- app/workflows/page.tsx
- app/contribute/page.tsx
- app/api/health/route.ts
- public/manifest.json, icons/

scripts/ additions:
- build-data.ts
- redact-transcript.ts
- validate-publication.ts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
